sectionTitle: Widgets, libraries and other unassorted things for Solar2D
sectionDescription: These projects range from individual tables or concepts to more complex functions and systems. Essentially, these projects come in all shapes and sizes, but I either didn't consider them big enough or distinct enough to turn them into plugins.

demos.title: Autotile
demos.descriptionShort: Touch a cell on a grid and Autotile figures out which tile to place and updates all connected tiles automatically.
demos.descriptionLong: Autotile is a Lua module for Solar2D that determines which tile should be placed at a selected location and automatically updates all surrounding tiles as necessary.

seo.ogDescription: Touch a cell on a grid and Autotile figures out which tile to place and updates all connected tiles automatically.
seo.metaDescription: Autotile is a Lua module for Solar2D that determines which tile to place at a selected location and automatically updates all surrounding tiles.

demos.title: Weaver
demos.descriptionShort: A narrative and dialogue engine for Solar2D with Twine 2 integration for creating branching stories and dialogue trees.
demos.descriptionLong:
Spyric Story Weaver is a narrative and dialogue engine for Solar2D with Twine 2 integration. It consists of a custom Twine 2 story format that exports interactive narratives as JSON, and a Lua runtime that parses and executes the exported stories in Solar2D games.

Features include variables, conditional blocks, navigation links, style markup, and dynamic code execution within story passages.

seo.ogDescription: A narrative and dialogue engine for Solar2D with Twine 2 integration for creating branching stories and dialogue trees.
seo.metaDescription: Spyric Story Weaver is a narrative and dialogue engine for Solar2D with Twine 2 integration for creating branching stories and dialogue trees.

demos.title: Morph
demos.descriptionShort: Morph allows for simple creation and scaling of display objects and their physics bodies in Solar2D.
demos.descriptionLong: Spyric Morph is a Solar2D plugin that allows for simple creation and scaling/morphing of display objects and their physics bodies. This makes it easy to dynamically transform visual objects alongside their associated physics bodies in your games and apps.

seo.ogDescription: Morph allows for simple creation and scaling of display objects and their physics bodies in Solar2D.
seo.metaDescription: Spyric Morph allows for simple creation and scaling/morphing of display objects and their physics bodies in Solar2D.

demos.title: Performance Meter
demos.descriptionShort: A customisable on-screen meter for tracking FPS, texture memory, and memory usage in your Solar2D app.
demos.descriptionLong: Performance Meter is a customisable on-screen widget for keeping track of FPS, texture memory, and memory usage in Solar2D apps.

seo.ogDescription: A customisable on-screen meter for tracking FPS, texture memory, and memory usage in your Solar2D app.
seo.metaDescription: Performance Meter is a customisable on-screen widget for tracking FPS, texture memory, and memory usage in Solar2D apps.

demos.title: Print to Display
demos.descriptionShort: Print to Display adds a console to your app, making it easy to view prints even while testing on devices.
demos.descriptionLong: Print to Display is a simple to use Solar2D plugin for displaying print() outputs on an in-app console as well as in the simulator console. This makes debugging on devices easier as no external tools are needed.

seo.ogDescription: Print to Display adds a console to your app, making it easy to view prints even while testing on devices.
seo.metaDescription: Print to Display adds a console to your app, making it easy to view prints even while testing on devices.

demos.title: Progress Ring
demos.descriptionShort: A quick and easy plugin for creating progress rings (or circles) in Solar2D.
demos.descriptionLong: Progress Ring is a Solar2D plugin that lets you easily create customisable vector-based progress rings (or circles). Simply set the progress value and the ring updates automatically.

seo.ogDescription: A quick and easy plugin for creating progress rings (or circles) in Solar2D.
seo.metaDescription: A quick and easy plugin for creating progress rings (or circles) in Solar2D.

demos.title: screen.lua
demos.descriptionShort: A table of dynamically calculated screen values for creating resolution-independent UIs and layouts in Solar2D.

demos.title: advancedAudio.lua
demos.descriptionShort: An advanced audio management library for Solar2D with channel management, priority system, and audio type categorization.

demos.title: Verify Domain
demos.descriptionShort: A set of Lua functions for verifying that your Solar2D HTML5 app is running on approved domains, helping prevent unauthorized hosting.
demos.descriptionLong: Verify Domain provides a set of Lua functions for verifying that your Solar2D HTML5 app is running on approved domains. This helps prevent unauthorized copies of your app from being hosted on unapproved websites.

seo.ogDescription: A set of Lua functions for verifying that your Solar2D HTML5 app is running on approved domains, helping prevent unauthorized hosting.
seo.metaDescription: Verify Domain provides Lua functions for verifying that your Solar2D HTML5 app is running on approved domains, helping prevent unauthorized hosting.
